sentence.Network_en: The director wants a waif-like, teenage girl with long, dark hair for the role.
sentence.Network_cn: 导演想要一个留着乌黑的长发、面黄肌瘦的十来岁女孩扮演这个角色。

sentence.Network_en: Maybe I should play this needy, despondent waif card more often.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许我应该用用这个迷惑, 多需求的招牌.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 淡淡的英文单词怎么写？-外语-天涯问答 ... urbane a. 有礼貌的，文雅的 waif n. 无家可归者，流浪儿童 weird a. 不可思议的，奇怪的.
流字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 流览〖 glanceover;skimthrough;browse〗 流浪儿〖 streeturchin;waif〗 流泪〖 shedtears〗.
航海及海运专业英语词汇(W1) ... wai 河河 waif 浮标;漂流物 waif 浮标漂流物信号旗.
英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... barf（ 呕吐，吐出）； waif（ 流浪者）； gaffe（ 失礼，失言）；.

list.abs: a woman who sports this emaciated , skeletal physique is called a waif , which is a thin person who appears fragile and needy .瘦骨嶙峋的女人被称为细挑个儿，看上去弱不禁风。
constructing a new pattern of waif relief system ., 构建新型流浪儿童救助体系研究.
A waif is begging on the street ., 街上有一个流浪儿正在乞讨.
Two young waifs steals a pair of boots ., 两个年轻的流浪者偷一双长筒靴.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from an Anglo-Norman French variant of Old Northern French gaif, probably of Scandinavian origin. Early use was often in waif and stray, as a legal term denoting a piece of property found and, if unclaimed, falling to the lord of the manor

entry.tran: 极瘦弱的人；无家可归者;流浪儿
entry.def: If you refer to a child or young woman as a waif, you mean that they are very thin and look as if they have nowhere to live.

example.ex: ...a dirty-faced waif of some five or six years...
example.tran: 五六岁大、脸上脏兮兮的流浪儿

example.ex: The director wants a waif-like, teenage girl with long, dark hair for the role.
example.tran: 导演想要一个留着乌黑的长发、面黄肌瘦的十来岁女孩扮演这个角色。

means.word_mean: 1. a homeless child especially one forsaken or orphaned;

sentences.sentence: "street children beg or steal in order to survive"

auth_sentence.content: Self-styled poetess, folk goddess and country waif Pieta's music resonates with a seductive simplicity and lyrical grace.

sentences.en: There are lots of waifs and strays living on the streets here.
sentences.cn: 这里有很多露宿街头的无家可归者。

sentences.en: My wife is always inviting various waifs and strays from work to our house.She seems to attract them.
sentences.cn: 我妻子总是邀请公司里各种各样的单身男女到家中作客,他们很愿意和她交往。
